popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee combat
A mastery path focused on siphoning power from your enemies

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Bleed Out
data.description: Increases Lacerate, Sanguinary Extension, and Fell Sacrifice's durations by an additional 6 seconds.

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will regain 30 Soul Essence every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Bound by Blood
data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that you will also be healed for 25% of the same amount.

data.name: Consume Enchantment
data.note:
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fueled Actions
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Soul Essence.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Blessing
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Imbuement
data.description: Any time you hit an enemy with a Path of Torture ability, there is a 33% chance that they will suffer an additional 453 Spirit damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Withdrawal
data.description: Removes all Ailments and Hexes from your group.

data.name: Life's End
data.description: For 10 seconds, you allow your group mates within 100 feet (instead of yourself) to feast on the life essence of your victims, healing everyone for 100% of the melee damage you deal.

data.name: Patch Wounds
data.note:
Requires 25 Soul Essence
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
data.description: You patch an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex.

data.name: Potent Covenants
data.description: Increases the chance for your Covenants to trigger by an additional 15%.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.description: Your target is gradually infused with 1700 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Stand, Coward!
data.description: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Terrifying Vision
data.description:
Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

If wearing a shield or dual wielding this will also affect all enemies within 30 feet of you for 5 seconds.

data.name: Transferred Focus
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your defensive target will receive 20% more incoming healing for 10 seconds.

data.name: Uncaring Dismissal
data.description: A great energy washes over all targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Universal Confusion
data.description: Raw power erupts in a 30 feet area around you, inflicting 1200 damage and Staggering all enemies around you for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Wracking Agony
data.description: A merciless attack which deals 164 damage to your enemy, or if they are below 50% hit points, instead inflicts 389 damage and will almost always critically hit.

data.name: Blood Guard
data.description: You attack with your buckler dealing 239 damage to your enemy, and increases your chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Unyielding Tormentor
data.description: You free yourself from all roots and snares.  For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Terrifying Aura
data.description: Terrifying Vision will always also affect all enemies within 30 feet of you for 5 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Bounty
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 712 damage.

data.name: Soul Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 1162 damage for each person.

data.name: Efficient Patching
data.description: Patch Wounds will now remove one Ailment or Hex for the entire group.

data.name: Khaine's Vigor
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains 783 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Restored Motivation
data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Khaine's Refreshment
data.description: You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to 3 seconds.  Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain 246 health, and you will lose 20 Soul Essence.  This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Thousand and One Dark Blessings
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 1320, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 504 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Murderous Intent
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by 20%.

data.name: Sanguinary Extension
data.description: A slice aimed at fresh wounds which deals 239 damage.  If the enemy was Crippled, then they are further Crippled and take an additional 250 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Bloodthirst
data.description: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal 337 Spirit damage.

data.name: Drowning in Blood
data.description: Blood lust drives you on, your attacks will ignore 25% the victim's armor and the cooldowns of Path of Torture abilities will be reduced by 5 seconds during the next 20 seconds.

data.name: Curse of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with single target damage, all healing used on them for the next 5 seconds will become 50% less effective.

data.name: Execute
data.note:
Target must be below 50% health
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Requires Dual Wield
data.description: Deals 502 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.description: Victim is overcome with seemingly endless visions of their own grisly death. So real are the visions, that the victim suffers 2394 damage over 7 seconds and will not generate any morale for every second of agony.

data.name: Horrifying Offering
data.description: Consume Strength will now also cause the victim to lose 50 Action Points.

data.name: Pillage Essence
data.description: A strike into your target's soul which deals 254 damage and causes them to lose 50 Action Points.  You will gain additional Soul Essence for most of the action points that the enemy lost.

data.name: Gift of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with an ability from the Path Of Sacrifice, your defensive target will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 10 seconds which will absorb up to 375 damage.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Devour Essence
data.description: You surround yourself or an ally with a devouring aura for up to 5 seconds.  Each second, your ally will deal 164 damage to up to 4 enemies within 10 feet of them, and become healed for 60% of all the damage done.  You will lose 25 Soul Essence each second, and this effect will end if you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Empowered Transfer
data.description:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Consume Essence will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.

data.name: Soul Ward
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 25 Soul Essence per second
data.description:
You channel a Soul Ward making you immune from any roots or snare effects and increasing Parry, Dodge and Disrupt of you and your Group by 10%. Each second your group is surrounded by a protective barrier absorbing up to 255 ranged damage.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Chant of Pain
data.description: You call upon the Word of Pain, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 30 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Reveling in their agony, you are healed for all damage inflicted by the Word of Pain.

data.name: Restore Essence
data.description: Dark forces restore 370 health to an ally immediately, and another 445 over 5 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Invigoration
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 581 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Khaine's Embrace
data.description: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain 477 health.

data.name: Fist of Khaine
data.description: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing 127 Spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Covenant of Tenacity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: A pact with Khaine that increases the armor of all groupmates within 100 feet of you by 660.

data.name: Lacerate
data.description: A gory strike that Cripples your enemy, dealing 101 damage initially and another 150 damage over 10 seconds and reducing their Toughness by 120.

data.name: Flay
data.description: You flay your target for 239 damage.  If target is Crippled, they are further Crippled as they become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Essence Lash
data.description: You lash out at all opponents in front of you up to 50 feet away, dealing 138 damage and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.

data.name: Covenant of Celerity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to Cripple anyone that they damage, dealing 187 Spirit damage and reducing the victim's run speed by 20% for 9 seconds.

data.name: Fell Sacrifice
data.description: Cripples all targets within 30 feet of you for 840 damage over 12 seconds.

data.name: Cleave Soul
data.description: A potent attack which deals 202 damage to your enemy. If behind your target, ignores 660 armor.

data.name: Transfer Essence
data.description: An unholy attack which deals 163 damage to your target and spills out a portion of their soul, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for 163 points plus 80% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Rend Soul
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 109 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Covenant of Vitality
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional 187 Spirit damage to their victim, and heal themselves for an equal amount.

data.name: Consume Thought
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals 239 damage to your enemy and silences them for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Consume Strength
data.description: A Crippling attack which deals 192 damage and reduces your enemy's Strength by 80 for 20 seconds.  Your defensive target's Strength is increased by 80.

data.name: Warding Strike
data.description:
A cunning strike which deals 202 damage to your enemy and reduces their chance to parry by 10% for 15 seconds.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Blood of my Blood
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 25 Soul Essence per second
data.description:
To defeat your enemies you need to empower your team, you will suffer 450 damage every second, any groupmates within 100ft will have 787 health restored to them.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Consume Essence
data.description: A quick strike which deals 86 Spirit damage.  Khaine's approval of your actions causes your defensive target and all allies within 20 feet to become healed for 150% of the damage that you dealt.
